chunks.text:
I input group gross margin in the social gross margin column.

Nagoya Matsuzakaya is planned to close in next March, but the information is filled in per request.

I checked with retail team, but they do not have surface of Iwataya and Umeda Hankyu information, I leave it blank.

Office CAPEX is the % allocation from Bernardaud Japan, since the office lease contract is between Bernardaud and the Owner.

 

Since I used the group gross margin, not the general formula for the interruption insurance (such as using operating income + fixed costs), so I did not input supplies and other costs.

 

Best regards,

 

Yoshiko Kusano

Christofle Japan

2F, 5-10-6, Minami-Aoyama, Minato-ku, 107-0062, Japan

Thank you for the confirmation for the stock Policy at all our premises including transit between warehouse to stores, and stores to stores.

 

We would like to confirm below insurance.

Since Japan insurance is “Prepaid”, so if we cannot get the confirmation, we will proceed the extend the current contracts.

*        Liability insurance

*        Comprehensive domestic logistics transportation insurance

*        CAPEX (Fixed assets in stores and offices)

I hope this message finds you well.

 

I confirm that we have requested the inclusion of Christofle Japan (CJ) in the Stock Throughput Policy (STP) based on the estimated annual turnover of CJ. This step ensures coverage for all transit activities related to CJ.

 

To finalize this process and include cover for the stock whist they are at place in the CJ premises, I kindly request your assistance in providing a detailed breakdown of the static stock values for the respective CJ premises.

Remain at your disposal for any assistance required.

Hagop

CJ and BJ have insurance separately as independent legal entity.

*  Liability insurance (AIG  Chubb)

Please find the attached template filled in.

 

Please note that:

I input group gross margin in the social gross margin column.

Nagoya Matsuzakaya is planned to close in next March, but the information is filled in per request.

I checked with retail team, but they do not have surface of Iwataya and Umeda Hankyu information, I leave it blank.

Office CAPEX is the % allocation from Bernardaud Japan, since the office lease contract is between Bernardaud and the Owner.

I hope this message finds you well.

 

I confirm that we have requested the inclusion of Christofle Japan (CJ) in the Stock Throughput Policy (STP) based on the estimated annual turnover of CJ. This step ensures coverage for all transit activities related to CJ.

 

To finalize this process and include cover for the stock whist they are at place in the CJ premises, I kindly request your assistance in providing a detailed breakdown of the static stock values for the respective CJ premises.

 

When providing the updated list of location with the revised values, if you could include the CJ details as well, that would be great.

 

Remain at your disposal for any assistance required.

Hagop

Dear Pauline

 

As long as I know, I have not seen any insurance policy that says OAK underwrote the policy.

CJ and BJ have insurance separately as independent legal entity.

CBJ does not have retail/wholesale business or operation, so only have the personnel cost related insurance.

*  Liability insurance (AIG  Chubb)

*  Comprehensive domestic logistics transportation insurance (Chubb AIG )

*  CAPEX (AIG)

Please find the attached template filled in.

 

Please note that:

I input group gross margin in the social gross margin column.

Nagoya Matsuzakaya is planned to close in next March, but the information is filled in per request.

I checked with retail team, but they do not have surface of Iwataya and Umeda Hankyu information, I leave it blank.

Dear Yoshiko,

 

I hope you are fine.

 

We need to include Japan in our contents and business interruption insurance cover so may you complete the 2024 file enclosed and send it back beginning of next week?

We need the address of each site we own and the contents and annual gross margin to be insured per site.

 

I let the 2021 declaration we received from Japan enclosed as an example.

 

Many thanks in advance,

Kind regards,

 

Marion BELLEC
